title:  The role of Borges’ collaborators is much discussed. Emir Rodríguez Monegal divides them into two groups: the amanuenses who chased down references and occasionally finished up a Borgesian sentence, sometimes in ways that would be confusing; and the genuine partners such as Adolfo Bioy de Casares.
